results.content:
This very short introduction in Spring 5, some part are complicated , i dont think that a newbee will be served right , look up another course for Spring introduction, this more or less intermediary level. Code partially works  (i used Eclipse throughout this course) and this why i give 3 stars.
- The last topics are too much rushed
-The code works only partially
-basically in my opinion the last 3 lectures are waste of time.
